name: Snake Dive
description:
The game

Snake Dive is a 3D spin on the Classic Snake Game. It is a casual game that lets you control the snake as it eats apples to grow as large as possible, without running into itself or falling off the grid. But apples appear on both sides of the grid, so to get them all, the snake must "dive" to the other side, entangling itself in an increasingly knotted mess! Can you survive ?

Features
  • Relaxing or challenging gameplay (choose grid dimensions, snake speed, Classic/3D game).
  • Keyboard controls with remappable keys.
  • Skin change.
  • Different display options (camera movement, grid/snake appearance).
  • A 90-second animation as a reward for game completion.
Release dates

Currently, only the FREE demo version is available.

The full desktop version will be available on August 31 and the full mobile version (Android) on October 31.

Developed by

The game is written in C++/OpenGL by one guy who likes coding and puzzles.
